headline: Perfect Day secures Series D funding
summary: Secures $100M to expand production of precision-fermented dairy proteins.

headline: Redefine Meat launches new alt-steak
summary: Improved texture and flavor in 3D-printed plant-based steak alternative.

headline: MycoWorks partners with Adidas
summary: New sustainable footwear line using mycelium-based leather alternative.

headline: Modern Meadow unveils bio-leather
summary: Next-gen bio-fabricated leather with superior durability and sustainability.

headline: Clara Foods expands egg-white production
summary: Increases capacity to meet growing demand for precision-fermented egg whites.

headline: Pangaia launches seaweed-based fabric
summary: New clothing line uses sustainable seaweed-derived materials for reduced environmental impact.

headline: Air Protein secures major investment
summary: Raises $75M to scale up production of air-based protein for food applications.

headline: BioMASON develops new bio-cement
summary: Sustainable alternative to traditional cement with reduced carbon footprint.

headline: Notpla partners with major food chain
summary: Seaweed-based packaging solution adopted by large retailer for food applications.

headline: Meatable announces cultivated bacon
summary: New cultivated bacon product shows promise in taste and texture.
